column2: "In all things, all possible outcomes cannot come to pass. One must choose between two alternatives."
"A new Matter Board has been formed. New paths have been opened, as the future shows signs of change."
"Your actions will determine that future. I apologize again for my ambiguous expressions."
"The only thing that I and We can say is that past and future events will become apparent."

"Darkers are a real pain aren't they.
Even after defeating them,
residual fragments corrupt organic
and inorganic alike,
causing them to go berserk."

"Thankfully, the photons within
our body is able to completely
neutralise these residual fragments."

"That is why ARKS is able to defeat
Darkers. Without the use of
photons, other lifeforms are not
able to completely annihilate the
Darkers."

"Regius, Maria and I are similar
in terms of talent. However, your
talents are on a different level."

"To be able to absorb and purify
the Darker within the infected
dragon... I am not capable of
doing so."

"Truth be told, thats a terrifying
ability. But I guess that one of
the reasons why Xion chose you."

"Because you managed to stop the
dragonkin from going berserk, you
changed the future. This also
established a contact with the
Dragonkins."

"I don't know how would the future
play out but I guess it was a
crucial point for Xion's motives."
